messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Essays by unschoolers about unschooling?
messages.messageBody:
<<<<<Recently I shared Laurie Chancey's website and writings with my son,
Zach 14. He told me
he'd like to read more essays like hers. Essays written by unschoolers
about their life, being
unschooled, going to college or life after college.

Can anyone direct me towards any of these?>>>>

Life Learning Magazine has a column Grown Without Schooling that is also a
video about grown unschoolers.

www.grownwithoutschooling.com

www.lifelearningmagazine.com

Robyn L. Coburn




--
